root.name: Bounce Out
root.description: This is a pacman clone with a few twists. You still have to collect all the red dots but in Bounce Out you get bombs that you can plant to kill you enemies. The special dots in Bounce Out don't become invincible you get a speed boost. The speed boost has a down side to it though if you don't turn corners at the precise time you fall of the edge of edge of the level.
